parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token to start the next query to retrieve more results.

> This parameter is not required for the first query. If a query does not return all results, pass the **NextToken** value from the previous response in the next query to continue.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the instance is located. Call the [DescribeRegions](~~426062~~) operation to get the region ID.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to **INSTANCE**.
